title: Lentil Soup
source: The Food of Sicily - Fabrizia Lanza
categories: The Food of Sicily - Fabrizia Lanza
ingredients: ¼cup (60 ml) olive oil, plus more for drizzling
1tomato, peeled and chopped, or 1 tablespoon estratto or tomato paste
Fine sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
Chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, for serving
directions: 1. In a medium pot, cook the garlic in olive oil over medium heat until fragrant and golden, 2 to 3 minutes.2. Add the onion and carrots, stirring to coat with oil, and cook for about 5 minutes until softened.3. Stir in the tomato and bay leaves, cooking for another 2 minutes.4. Season with ½ teaspoon salt and ½ teaspoon pepper.5. Add the lentils, potato, and water. Bring to a boil.6. Reduce to a simmer, partially cover, and cook until lentils are tender and soup has thickened, 1½ to 2 hours.7. Adjust seasoning to taste.8. Serve drizzled with olive oil and sprinkled with chopped parsley.
